item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 21–24 July 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 21–24 July 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Demokrati (EPP): 4.8–9.2%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 2.7–6.2%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (PfE): 1.8–4.8%
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 20.9–28.3%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 3.4–7.2%
  • Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 1.4–4.1%
  • Resni.ca (NI): 4.2–8.3%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 29.1–37.3%
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 0.9–3.3%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 5.3–9.9%
  • Zeleni Slovenije (RE): 0.0–1.1%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.6–6.0%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 7–9 July 2025 – Voting Intentions
